item.title: Michael Rembis, "Writing Mad Lives in the Age of the Asylum" (Oxford UP, 2025)
item.description: An interview with Michael Rembis Feed: https://feeds.megaphone.fm/LIT4261575335

item.title: Episode 210 - Bones
item.description: The evolution of mineralized tissues is responsible not only for the incredible success and diversity of vertebrate animals, but also for their extraordinarily informative fossil record. This episode, we explore the detailed anatomy of bones and their deep evolutionary history, we touch on some of the ways theyâ€™re important for paleontology, and we take some time to discuss the secrets that can be found inside of ancient bones... Feed: https://feed.podbean.com/commondescentpodcast/feed.xml
